IESNA recommends 80% ceiling reflectance and 60% forwindow wall reflectances and 30-70% for windowless walls.  see NRC C.O.P.E. research for further infohttp://irc.nrc-cnrc.gc.ca/ie/cope/04-3-Lighting_Design_e.html#_Elementshope that helpssteve> Date: Wed, 10 Dec 2008 17:56:38 +0800>
